snippet: The investigation followed accusations from Hewlett-Packard that Autonomy had carried out accounting abuses that forced the tech giant to write down $8.8 billion from its takeover of the British company.
abstract: The investigation followed accusations from Hewlett-Packard that Autonomy had carried out accounting abuses that forced the tech giant to write down $8.8 billion from its takeover of the British company.

headline.main: British Fraud Office Ends HP-Autonomy Inquiry
headline.print_headline: British Agency Closes Inquiry Into Autonomy
